manifest.name: Vault File Renamer
manifest.description: This plugin standardizes the names of files in your vault by converting them to lowercase, replacing spaces with underscores, and removing accents and unwanted characters.
manifest.author: Louan Fontenele

data.manifestValue: This plugin standardizes the names of files in your vault by converting them to lowercase, replacing spaces with underscores, and removing accents and unwanted characters.
data.communityListValue: Automatically standardizes file names to GitHub style (lowercase, no accents, only -, ., _) while preserving folder structure and file contents.
